mapper.update: update tbl_item set item_name = #{itemName}, item_price = #{itemPrice}, item_type = #{itemType}, item_state = #{itemState}, updated_datetime = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, item_store_id, item_category_id, item_name, item_type, item_stock, item_price, item_delivery_fee, item_content, item_state, item_view_count, created_datetime, updated_datetime from tbl_item
